title: Tziporah Malkah leaves fans shocked as she strips NAKED for a bizarre selfie
text:
Tziporah Malkah recently debuted her incredible 50kg weight loss, after previously tipping the scales at 120kg.

And the 45-year-old former model offered fans a glimpse of her slimmed-down frame on Friday when she stripped down for a naked selfie.

In a post shared to Instagram in the early hours of the morning, the Sirens star posed in bed wearing nothing but a pink sheet and spectacles.

Daring to bare! Tziporah Malkah offered fans a glimpse of her 50kg weight loss on Friday when she stripped down for a naked Instagram selfie

Tziporah, formerly known as Kate Fischer, covered her modesty with the sheet and her iPhone as she snapped a selfie in her bedroom mirror.

She captioned the photo: 'Who me?... Oh hey there.'

Her fans were left stunned by the post, with one person asking: 'Are you wearing anything other than the sheet there?'

'I love myself right now': Tziporah's bizarre nude selfie comes after she revealed her dramatic weight loss transformation on A Current Affair earlier this month

Tziporah's bizarre nude selfie comes after she revealed her dramatic weight loss transformation on A Current Affair earlier this month.

The one-time Sydney 'It girl', who was engaged to James Packer in the late '90s, said she had lost 50kg thanks to healthy eating, surgery and hypnotherapy.

She underwent a 'mini lipo tuck' and a Brazilian butt lift, and also worked alongside Mark Stephens, a hypnotherapist specialising in weight loss.

Body battles: Tziporah's weight had ballooned after she relocated to the U.S. in the early 2000s. She decided to slim down after tipping the scales at 120kg during her appearance on I'm A Celebrity... Get Me Out Of Here! in 2017 (pictured)

'[The] mental anguish from all the stresses of life are just not there anymore. And I think that's probably the greatest gift,' she said of her journey.

Breaking down in tears, she added: 'I'm proud but I'm also incredibly vain! I love myself right now.'

Tziporah's weight had ballooned after she relocated to the U.S. in the early 2000s. She decided to slim down after tipping the scales at 120kg during her appearance on I'm A Celebrity... Get Me Out Of Here! in 2017.
description: Tziporah Malkah recently debuted her incredible 50kg weight loss, after previously tipping the scales at 120kg.
authors: Jo Scrimshire For Daily Mail Australia
